text: Nandao ni mei kanjian naxie ren ma? Youren dui tamen shuo:“Nimen dang kongzhi zhu nimen [yongwu] de shuangshou, dang jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke.” Dang zhanzheng ding wei tamen de zhuming shi, tamen zhong you yibufen ren weiju diren youru weiju an la yiyang, shenzhi geng weiju. Tamen shuo:“Women de zhu a! Ni weisheme ba zhanzheng ding wei women de zhuming ne? Ni weisheme bu yanhuan women yi xiaoduan shijian ne?” Ni shuo:“Jinshi de xiangshoushi duanzan de, hou shi dui jingwei zhe cai shi zui hao de. Nimen bu shou sihao kuidai.
